dccPortalNewsList.title: Data Matrix Web Service now available
dccPortalNewsList.article: A REST-style web service interface is now available for the Data Matrix application. Please see the Web Service User Guide for detailed instructions and further information.

dccPortalNewsList.title: FTP/SFTP protocols deprecated
dccPortalNewsList.article: Please see this wiki news post for more information.

dccPortalNewsList.title: Overview of TCGA data organization and access
dccPortalNewsList.article: Powerpoint presentation on TCGA data by Derek Chiang (UNC) given at the 2010 ISMB Conference, Boston, 07/12/2010. This is an excellent overview of TCGA data organization and access.

dccPortalNewsList.title: DCC Web Service
dccPortalNewsList.article: The DCC database is now accessible via a RESTful web service. For information on using this web service, please see the DCC Web Service User Guide.

dccPortalNewsList.title: TCGA Data Service on caGrid
dccPortalNewsList.article:
A TCGA caGrid data service that allows access to public TCGA data is now available.
For more information, please see the TCGA Grid User Guide.

dccPortalNewsList.title: TCGA Ovarian Data Freeze 2
dccPortalNewsList.article: A list of the archives that comprise the 08/05/09 Ovarian data freeze is available here. The freeze includes all characterization data through Batch 15, some sequence-trace data through Batch 13. Mutation files included in this freeze can be found here.

dccPortalNewsList.title: Clinical Data Available
dccPortalNewsList.article: Updated clinical data for GBM and Ovarian samples are available via the Data Matrix: Ovarian Clinical Data, GBM Clinical Data. Clinical archives for both disease types are available via SFTP (caftps.nci.nih.gov).

dccPortalNewsList.title: TCGA Sequencing Data
dccPortalNewsList.article: The TCGA network has selected more than 6,000 gene and miRNA targets for sequencing that represent both protein-coding genes and microRNAs (miRNAs). Click here for the TCGA Sequencing Data page.

dccPortalNewsList.title: TCGA Ovarian Data Freeze 1
dccPortalNewsList.article: A list of the archives that comprise the 05/01/09 Ovarian data freeze is available here.

dccPortalNewsList.title: New and Revised Ovarian Clinical Data Available
dccPortalNewsList.article: Use the Find Archives search interface and select "Serous cystadenocarcinoma (OV)" as the Cancer Type and "Complete Clinical Set" as the Data Type to get a comprehensive list of the latest clinical data archives.

dccPortalNewsList.title: Public Clinical Data File
dccPortalNewsList.article: All current public GBM clinical data is available in tab-delimited format here.

dccPortalNewsList.title: Tier 1 Clinical Data Spreadsheet
dccPortalNewsList.article: The Tier 1 Clinical Data as of the 10/01/08 update of the BCR Data is available here

dccPortalNewsList.title: GBM Publication Data Freeze
dccPortalNewsList.article: A list of the archives that comprise the GBM Publication Data Freeze is available here.

dccPortalNewsList.title: TCGA Reports First Results
dccPortalNewsList.article:
In a paper published Sept. 4, 2008, in the advance online edition of the journal Nature, the TCGA team describes the discovery of new genetic mutations and other types of DNA alterations with potential implications for the diagnosis and treatment of GBM.
Complete press release
GBM Publication Site
GBM Publication Data Freeze

dccPortalNewsList.title: Broad MAF File Correction
dccPortalNewsList.article: Broad had a problem with their last MAF file generation that caused the alleles in the file to be copied in incorrectly.  The status descriptions were accurate (validation status, somatic status) but the alleles listed for sequencing & validation genotypes were not.  Broad uploaded a new MAF on Friday 8/15, so please use this new file or a newer file for any downstream analysis.

dccPortalNewsList.title: Error within Clinical Data XML
dccPortalNewsList.article: Normal Tissue type '11' was defined as a tumor in three XML fields and has been corrected. If you used the name of sample/aliquot barcode to determine tumor vs normal, this error does not affect you. If you used the XML, please click here.

dccPortalNewsList.title: TCGA Data Freeze 2
dccPortalNewsList.article: A list of the archives that comprise the 04/10/08 data freeze is available Here. Previous freeze documents are located here.

dccPortalNewsList.title: Search by File Name
dccPortalNewsList.article: The search parameter should match a file name and NOT an archive name. You may enter the full file name (e.g. TCGA-02-0074-01A-01D_Segment.tsv) or a part of the name (e.g. TCGA-02-0074). The results list the archives that contain those files. To view the actual files contained in those archives click on "View Files" for each archive.
